meta.title: Ismael Resume
meta.description: My professional resume is available to everyone

sections.portfolio_title: Check out some of my work

hero.name: I'm Ismael Belisario.
hero.p1: I am a Venezuelan <1>Software Engineer</1> that can work with <3>different technologies</3> and levels of an application regardless of the platform. For example, I can create the design and interaction of the website (front-end), the logic and infrastructure behind it (back-end), and automate processes with robots (RPA).
hero.p2: In my free time I love to read books, visit new quiet places, play video games or just listen to classical music.

about.p1: Greetings! My name is Ismael Belisario. I am a <1>Software Developer</1> from the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, a country rich in culture and diversity. Since my childhood, I have been surrounded by inspiration and motivation, thanks to my parents, both education professionals, who have instilled in me the importance of perseverance and personal growth.
about.p2: My journey into the world of programming began when I was 14 years old, in 2010. Back then, my learning was based on reading technical books, as I didn't have access to the internet very often. Those days of self-taught study taught me not only about algorithms and programming languages, but also about resilience and determination.
about.p3: Over time, my arsenal of skills has grown exponentially. I have embraced technological evolution, adapting and expanding my knowledge in areas such as <1>test-driven development (TDD), data structures, frameworks, the intricate worlds of interpreters and compilers</1>, among other topics.
about.p4: Today, I pride myself on having a solid technical background and a burning passion for my profession. I have had the privilege of developing <1>websites</1> and <3>mobile applications</3>, as well as implementing process automation (<5>RPA</5>), with a particular focus on optimising administrative tasks.
about.p5: My commitment to best practices and design patterns is unwavering, and my thirst for knowledge is unquenchable. I am convinced that learning is a never-ending journey, and each new project is an opportunity to explore unknown horizons.
about.p6: I look forward to the possibility of collaborating on your project. Together, we can take your ideas to new heights and achieve success - let's make your vision a realityðŸ˜Š!

portfolio.title: Project title {{num}}
portfolio.description: Give a short description of your project here.

resume.skills_intro: These competencies represent a sample of my professional profile, which I have synthesized for ease of understanding. However, my work experience has provided me with many more capabilities.

items.title: Computer Engineering
items.content: Regular student, learning UML, mathematics, software architecture among other subjects.

items.title: Junior RPA Developer
items.content: I've mainly worked on RPA using tools like Playwright and Python-o365 among others, as well as occasionally working on the backend with Django and FastAPI.

items.title: Mobile and web developer
items.content: As a freelance developer, I specialize in developing dynamic websites using JavaScript (Next.js and React) for the frontend and Python (Django, Flask and FastApi) for the backend. I also have experience in Android app development using Flutter. I excel at taking requirements, designing and implementing custom solutions for each project. I am committed to technical excellence and customer satisfaction at all stages of development.

items.name: John Doe
items.text: Use this as an opportunity to promote what it is like to work with you. High value testimonials include ones from current or past co-workers, managers, or from happy clients.

items.name: Jane Doe
items.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. Encourage them to be specific and include important details (notes about a project you were on together, impressive quality produced, etc).

items.name: Someone else
items.text: Add several of these, and keep them as fresh as possible, but be sure to focus on quality testimonials with strong highlights of your skills/work ethic.

contact.description: If you have reached this point, it is a good idea to get in touch and start cooperating together.
